title: Streaming an 1-hour video (ADEME)
description:
This video streaming emission factor is commonly used for comparison in carbon emission calculations. The ADEME database is often cited as the source (although it no longer includes this value), as is a study by NÃ©gaOctet (which can no longer be found on the Internet).

This figure should be treated with caution as it does not consider key factors in the calculation of emissions from this activity, such as the energy grid and the end-user device.
